name: Archevnebi 2021 (ALPHA)
description:
Welcome to Archevnebi 2021! (Elections 2021)

You got elected as a dictator for the country Georgia!

But you feel like that is not enough! so you decided to take over the world!
Can you defeat the rival opponents that want to do the same? 

Heck can you even civilize other planets in the solar system?

Play the game to feel that dictator power! but also try not to get hated by the people, orelse.. your plan is ruined! so watch out!

This game features:
-Building

-War 

-3D

-Card Packs to unlock extra buildings! (Will be out in full game)

Discover the truth and lore about a lot of stuff in this 4 Chapter game!

Well... what are you waiting for? Go conquer the whole world!

PLEASE NOTE: The Screenshots are from ALPHA.

Check out the website!

https://kokistudio.netlify.app

Want to report a bug or perhaps just want to hang out or play some custom bots or are interested in any of the applications/bots/games? Please join into this server:
https://discord.gg/Emmb3yQY6F

THE GAME HAS ONLY BEEN TESTED ON WINDOWS! I DO NOT KNOW IF IT WILL RUN ON MACOS OR LINUX!
